segments.text: Hey Annie , who is this picture of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's my great , great , great , great , great , great , great grandfather .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you can say your seventh great grandfather ! Cutie ! What's his name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Peter Madsen . A great A if I do say so myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice pun . What is it you active about him most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He loved his family and his countrymen and his freedom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He looks like a very personable man .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He was . He was friendly toward and showed concern for everyone he met .
segments.speaker: S2
